description: Odyssey aims to use blockchain and driverless technology to create a transparent decentralized driverless travel platform and become the infrastructure of the next generation of intelligent transportation. Odyssey uses the public chain as the underlying layer for data storage and extends the private chain to focus on data decryption. The former provides a platform for automobile trading and sharing travel, while the latter provides data services for users of Odyssey and its partners.
name: Odyssey
